TopicTitle: Minor bug/gripe: Renaming craft from Tracking Station is not ‘durable’

Articles.Content:
If I launch a vessel with multiple sub-probes/relay satellites, I’d like to rename them to Relay 01, Relay 02, Relay 03 etc., or an LKO station has its name from VAB/launch, until something docks to it, then it has a generic name + (combined).

 

I see/use the ‘pencil’ icon to enter a renaming mode, give it a name, hit Enter/pencil again, and it usually renamed itself for a while, or sometimes you’ll find you’ve just renamed the KSC instead, despite having Focus on your probe/station. Leaving Tracking Station and/or moving to control a vessel usually causes all vessels to revert to their previous names.

 

I observed this behaviour in Launch version and Patch One (0.1.0.x and 0.1.1.x).

 

Win 10

5900X, 48 GB DDR4

ASUS TUF 3080 10GB GDDR6X
Indeed, it should not cost too much to save properly the craft name after renaming... Currently, retrieving the proper craft when we have a dozen is quite a mess
